title: Investigation of non-precious metal cathode catalysts for direct borohydride fuel cells
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19636-19647
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02767A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yu Guo, Yingjian Cao, Qinggang Tan, Daijun Yang, Yong Che, Cunman Zhang, Pingwen Ming, Qiangfeng Xiao
Various cathode catalysts for DBFCs were investigated. The Mn–Co spinel catalyst showed exceptional BH4− tolerance, enhanced durability, and achieved a peak power density of 1.5 W cm−2.
